definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: I have been walking for four days since I left Toulon.
sentences.chinese: 我從土倫走來，已經走了四天了。

sentences.english: British weakness was underlined when the French fleet escaped from Toulon.
sentences.chinese: 法國艦隊從土倫逃遁一事反映出了英國的弱點。

sentences.english: He also represented his nation at the Toulon Tournament where Argentina finished 3rd.
sentences.chinese: 他還代表阿根廷出戰過土倫杯拿下了第三名。

sentences.english: At Toulon he was clothed in the red cassock.
sentences.chinese: 在土倫，他穿上紅色囚衣。
